section.title: {Numerical Math Functions}
section.content: Set of Python functions for numerical resolution of equations in the real domain. False Position, Bisection, Secant Method, and Newton-Raphson are employed for effective solution finding. The results are displayed in the terminal in LaTeX format. ğŸğŸ”¢ğŸ–¥ï¸.
